channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 765a04e0-5de8-4bb2-9bf6-b2a30bc03e91
Display name: Storage File Delegator
Description: Allows for generation of a user delegation key, which can then be used to create a shared access signature for a file or Azure file share that is signed with Entra ID credentials.
Link: https://management.azure.com/765a04e0-5de8-4bb2-9bf6-b2a30bc03e91?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 965033a5-c8eb-4f35-b82f-fef460a3606d
Display name: Storage Table Delegator
Description: Allows for generation of a user delegation key, which can then be used to create a shared access signature for an Azure Storage table that is signed with Entra ID credentials.
Link: https://management.azure.com/965033a5-c8eb-4f35-b82f-fef460a3606d?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7ee386e9-84f0-448e-80a6-f185f6533131
Display name: Storage Queue Delegator
Description: Allows for generation of a user delegation key, which can then be used to create a shared access signature for an Azure Storage queue that is signed with Entra ID credentials.
Link: https://management.azure.com/7ee386e9-84f0-448e-80a6-f185f6533131?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 6fbca9a8-3561-41fd-8b20-6576043c1076
Display name: Scheduled Actions Contributor
Description: Allows users to use Scheduled Actions offered by Microsoft.ComputeSchedule
Link: https://management.azure.com/6fbca9a8-3561-41fd-8b20-6576043c1076?api-version=2022-04-01
